definitions.text: fate personified; any one of the three Weird Sisters
suggesting the operation of supernatural influences; ; ; - John Galsworthy; ; - Henry Kingsley
examples: stumps...had uncanny shapes as of monstrous creatures
he could hear the unearthly scream of some curlew piercing the din

definitions.text: strikingly odd or unusual; - Bram Stoker
examples: some trick of the moonlight; some weird effect of shadow
